Hi ye all,
 I uploaded a pic of a sukashi tsuba to the list photo album inside album 
labelled " Milt's ".
Also kinly check the tsuba listed as tsuba 1 in Sho-shin's web site
 <A HREF="http://www.sho-shin.com/TSUBA1.htm">http://www.sho-shin.com/TSUBA1.htm</A> 

As you all can see, the design and style are very similar but there are 
subtle difference...e.g. the album's tsuba has no outline along the sukashi., 
the mimi seems to be more rounded.

Based on the photo..........
questions......
1. are the tsuba of the same school ?
2.  approximate time period ?  Early Edo ?  earlier even ?   Late Edo ?
3. Assuming one tsuba is larger than the other, can these two be " daisho "  
?

Danke in advance.................

Milt
